QuestData.Title: Return to the Grove
QuestData.Description: Now that my grove is safe, I can turn my attention to the threat you speak of.$B$BTo hear of Cenarius' plight is disturbing indeed. Tell Malfurion that I shall meet him at the Grove.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Malfurion Stormrage at the Grove of Cenarius in Val'sharah.
QuestData.RewardText: Wonderful. The Archdruids have already assembled.
